item.title: Remove `curl` alias from powershell permanently
item.description: It’s Powershell, not Windows Powershell. Check for existing powershell profile Test-Path $PROFILE If true, already exists, skip creation. Otherwise create it New-Item -Path $PROFILE -ItemType File -Force Open profile in notepad notepad $profile Add this line to the profile, save and close Remove-Item Alias:curl -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue Restart powershell If the alias is not removed after restart Ensure PowerShell is set to allow profile scripts by running Set-ExecutionPolicy RemoteSigned -Scope CurrentUser
